bibl.title: Sifting the Ruins: the "Iambi" of Callimachus. Review Article.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Polyeideia. The Iambi of Callimachus and the Archaic Iambic Tradition= Hellenistic Culture and Society. 35 (Berkeley - Los Angeles - London, 2002). - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 75 (2006) No. 1085.
NISETICH Frank, Sifting the Ruins: the "Iambi" of Callimachus. Review Article.
